name: places/ChIJKQMq39xZwokRj76u9oKmIZU

displayName.text: Martin Krasnoff, RAND REALTY NY LLC

formattedAddress: 132 W 95th St, New York, NY 10025, USA
adrFormatAddress: 132 W 95th St, New York, NY 10025-6604, USA

originalText.text: My Fiance and I rented an apartment with Marty acting as the liaison between the owner and ourselves. From the start Marty was great, he was able to facilitate a quick approval from the board of the building ensuring everything was submitted as quickly as possible. Once we were living in the apartment Marty responded quickly to anything we needed, big or small. When our lease ended and we had decided not to extend the move-out process was smooth and painless. I would recommend working with Marty in capacity, it really was great. Now that we have moved out of the city we really will miss both our beautiful apartment and the great working relationship with Marty and Rand Reality

originalText.text:
Marty really went above and beyond as a broker for our NYC apartment. From helping us feel comfortable and navigating a our first lease in a condo (condo board, single unit owner, etc) he made it easy for us to feel good about the nicest unit we had ever rented in NYC.

After we signed and moved in, I had thought Marty’s role in the process was done. But he stayed in communication with us, making sure everything was set up appropriately and acting as an intermediary between the unit owner and ourselves but always making communication clear, consistent and pleasant.

Upon our leases conclusion, Marty went above and beyond to work with us on restoring the unit to its original condition, helped us coordinate our cleaners after we had moved out, and worked on our behalf to have our security deposit returned quickly.

In short, Marty did what no other broker in my experience had ever done before; he made us feel like he was totally safe and confident during a lease transaction and did it in a pleasant and professional way. I can’t say enough about what a positive experience working with him was.

originalText.text:
Marty is an amazing agent to work with. He is insightful, patient and really takes the time to fully understand his clients needs and wants. He then spends the time needed to precisely choose properties to show. He spent two years with me on my journey to find my perfect apartment. During that time, we looked at a range of options from fixer uppers to gut renovations to new construction. Over that time, I better understood what I wanted and what would make me happy. I ended up with a magnificent 4 bedroom home in Manhattan’s upper Westside. Marty helped me through the board process and continues to help me with moving in concerns and helped find me a terrific interior designer. He has become a close friend and trusted advisor. On the side, he has even helped me with some commercial real estate solutions. I highly recommend him to anyone looking to find a home. He is a great partner to help you on your  New York City real estate journey.
—Stu

originalText.text:
I have worked with Marty for over twenty years on multiple real estate transactions and the results have always been both profitable and stress free.  Most recently, Marty helped me navigate the sale of my Harlem brownstone.  We secured several offers and Marty ensured my firm asking price was delivered.

Regardless of the type of property, co-op, condo and rental, you can rest assured that Marty will offer you professional and prompt guidance on the transaction.

I enthusiastically recommend Marty without condition and look forward to working with him on the next dea.

PM

originalText.text: It has truly been a pleasure working with Marty over the past couple years. His knowledge of the New York City real estate market is second to none and it shows in his work and ability to deliver for his clients. My family loved working with him and appreciate his work ethic and kindness throughout all of our transactions. We would highly recommend using Marty for any real estate needs in NYC!
